h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Glazed Reliquary Location
content: The Glazed Reliquary can be found in a box by a statue, within the Windrest Hamelet area of the Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge. As you make your way through this area, you will fight the Tiger Acolyte"), obtain the Old Rattle-Drum, and be able to continue onwards into a cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Glazed_Reliquary.md', within the main section titled 'Glazed Reliquary', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Glazed Reliquary Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Glazed Reliquary can be found in a box by a statue, within the Windrest Hamelet area of the Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge. As you make your way through this area, you will fight the Tiger Acolyte"), obtain the Old Rattle-Drum, and be able to continue onwards into a cave.
